questions.question: What was a possible reason Julian Rivers had to leave his job as VP at Davidson Wells Financial Corporation?

choices.answer: His bosses said it was time for him to go
There were reports of him protesting and people didn't like it
He chose to leave because things were not equal

questions.question: What does "Jihad" mean as we read in context of the novel "Dear Martin"?

choices.answer: Striving to overcome sin or struggle in oneself

questions.question: The Falling Action of a story is when things begin to settle and major problems are solved or concluded.
Which part of the acronym "RACE" requires you to explain your evidence and expand your thinking
Which part of the PLOT of a story is when things are conclude or resolved?
Which characters were tertagonist characters, and not really that important?
Which response is the best example of the falling action of the novel "Dear Martin"

choices.answer: Jared showing understanding of his mistakes
Justyce meeting Martel and understanding more about the Black Jihad group
Justyce standing up to his mother about SJ

questions.question: What does the novel show us about "Martel Montgomery" from the Black Jihad group?

choices.answer: He has a lot of Black and African art around his residence; he is smart
He never really cared and just wanted Justyce to join his gang
He was less smart than everyone expected since as he was in house arrest
He is as violent as people described him

questions.question: What is a potential theme or lesson in the novel so far?

choices.answer: It's about Justyce trying to find equality
The main idea was about how Jared and SJ and Justyce had their own problems
The theme is never give up on fighting for what is right
A theme is a message or lesson in a story

questions.question: What do I often say before and during class?
What were Quan's messages when Justyce visited him?

choices.answer: "Don't you ever give up young man" and "life is a challenge"
"nobody cares" and "you just got to fight the people at the top like me"
"Find a role model" and then "become a role model"
"There is strength in numbers" and "you have the power in you for change"

questions.question: What are two gifts Justyce receive when he was mourning Manny?

choices.answer: A trip to the mother land and a watch
